definition: Xiaojin county (Tibetan: btsan lha rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
Xiaojin county (Tibetan: btsan lha rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

sentences.english: Thanks to unknown military merits young Kim was just promoted to four-star general.
sentences.chinese: 仗着无人知晓的军功，小金刚刚被晋升为四星上将。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至怀疑现代福利院，是民政部门的小金库。
《泰坦尼克号》获得14项提名和11个小金人。

sentences.english: Boycott all Chinese Goods until China puts Little Kim back on the dog leash.
sentences.chinese: 抵制所有中国产品，直到中国再给小金拴上狗绳子。

sentences.english: It's a habit you might want to consider in order to build up your own little storehouse of cash.
sentences.chinese: 你可以借鉴这个习惯，建立一个自己的小金库。

sentences.english: A light purse is a heavy curse .
sentences.chinese: 小金库好比一个巨大的诅咒。

sentences.english: Would you mind taking Gene home?
sentences.chinese: 麻烦你把小金带回家好吗？

sentences.english: Haha, here are the whites of the Oscar, as did more than 20 days old.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，这里还有对小金眼白，好像才20多天大。

sentences.english: The cloud was dark, but seemed to have little golden lights inside.
sentences.chinese: 云很暗，但似乎有小金灯在里面。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有人怀疑，现代福利，是民政部门的小金库。

sentences.english: Ginny Weasley (Bonnie Wright) and Harry grow closer, even when his destiny threatens to pull them apart.
sentences.chinese: 小金妮和哈利日渐亲昵，但命运却要把两人分开。

sentences.english: The "departmental coffer" is a hotbed of corruption.
sentences.chinese: “小金库”是当前滋生腐败现象的温床。

sentences.english: Peek later traveled with an Oscar statuette.
sentences.chinese: 后来，Peek和一个奥斯卡小金人一起继续环游。

sentences.english: They had justgotten a puppy, a golden retriever they named Tucker.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚刚养了一只小金毛，取名叫做塔克。

sentences.english: If a winner refuses to agree to this stipulation, then the Academy keeps the statuette.
sentences.chinese: 如果获奖者不同意这项规定，学院将保留其小金人。

definition: Huanglong county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
(onom.) to rumble (of a stomach)/to coo (of a dove)/rumbling/noisy drinking sound
one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
